questions.text: what does Theo finally tell his Dad when he exploded on him near the end of the vacation?
questions.answer: He was angry about his Dad never discussing things with him, including his Mom, and that he wanted Theo to answer personal questions from Lucrecia when he didn't even know her.

questions.text: what doesTheo's dad realize he has done wrong with his relationship with Lucrecia?
questions.answer: He moved too quickly and didn't consider his children's feelings.

questions.text: what does Bob decide to do at the end of Theo's  graphic novel?
questions.answer: He decides not to take the pill and keep his perfect memory.
